articles.author: Randy Miller | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: A side Yankees fans never saw from Giancarlo Stanton comes out on his All-Star MVP night - NJ.com
articles.description: New York Yankees outfielder Giancarlo Stanton was emotional after winning the All-Star Game MVP on Tuesday night playing close to his childhood home in a ballpark he visited many times as a youngster.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES Giancarlo Stanton never was more emotional after a ballgame. Hitting a home run completely out of Dodger Stadium in a Miami Marlins uniform in 2015 was a tremendous thrill. His Tuesday ni… [+8101 chars]
